meanings.sent1: The group of dunderheads couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The dunderheads in the class always made silly mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The dunderheads thought a square wheel would be a great invention.
meanings.sent4: The dunderheads were like sheep following a clueless shepherd.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dunderheads tripping over their own feet was comical.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with dunderheads chatting loudly.
meanings.sent2: The dunderheads gathered around the table for a meeting.
meanings.sent3: The dunderheads all wore matching hats for no reason.
meanings.sent4: The dunderheads stood out in the crowd like colorful balloons.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dunderheads marching in unison was unforgettable.
